error.message: Entry %1 in _UniversalArray is not one of types: Array, Stream, Boolean, Number, String, Name, Null, Dictionary

rule.description: Entry with type Stream in _UniversalArray shall be indirect

error.message: Entry %1 with type Stream in _UniversalArray is direct

rule.description: Entry with type Array in _UniversalDictionary shall be object _UniversalArray

error.message: Entry %1 with type Array in _UniversalDictionary is not object _UniversalArray

rule.description: Entry with type Stream in _UniversalDictionary shall be object Stream

error.message: Entry %1 with type Stream in _UniversalDictionary is not object Stream

rule.description: Entry with type Dictionary in _UniversalDictionary shall be object _UniversalDictionary

error.message: Entry %1 with type Dictionary in _UniversalDictionary is not object _UniversalDictionary

rule.description: Entry in _UniversalDictionary shall have one of types: Array, Stream, Boolean, Number, String, Name, Null, Dictionary
rule.test: HasTypeArray == true || HasTypeStream == true || HasTypeBoolean == true || HasTypeNumber == true || HasTypeString == true || HasTypeName == true || HasTypeNull == true || HasTypeDictionary == true

error.message: Entry %1 in _UniversalDictionary is not one of types: Array, Stream, Boolean, Number, String, Name, Null, Dictionary

rule.description: Entry with type Stream in _UniversalDictionary shall be indirect

error.message: Entry %1 with type Stream in _UniversalDictionary is direct
